Title: Daddy's Girlfriend: Part 1
Writer: Pamela Adlon (story), Louis C.K. (story), Louis C.K. (teleplay), Louis C.K. (creator)
Actors: Louis C.K., Parker Posey, Maria Bamford, Hadley Delany
Plot: After Louie's kids put pressure him to find a girlfriend, he finds a potential prospect at the local bookstore.
